attributes.action: Remove the UAE from the UK's Red List
attributes.additional_details:
The UAE is one of the world’s leading vaccinators.

As of May 16, new cases of coronavirus in the country fell to just 1,251, while the number of vaccines doses administered rose to 11,450,769, with a rate of 115.78 doses per 100 people.

Plus, a new report places the UAE as the second-most pandemic resilient country in the world. The Pandemic Resilience Index ranked 40 countries on factors including vaccination approval dates, vaccination drives, critical care bed capacity and mass testing.
attributes.background: Arabian Business is urging for a review of the data ahead of the next available decision on the UK's Green, Amber and Red List. We ask you to remove the UAE from the Red List to allow travel, both for British citizens wanting visit loved ones, and for business and tourism travel to resume.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

To remove the UAE off the ‘Red List’ by the Summer
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575787
